TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropertyPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies constants that define the location in the project to insert a property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition UseExistingOrCreateAfterLastImport = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Replace the existing [Property](../Topic/Property%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element if it exists. Otherwise, create the `Property` after the last [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element in the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.PropertyPosition UseExistingOrCreateAfterLastPropertyGroup = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Replace the existing [Property](../Topic/Property%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element if it exists. Otherwise, if possible, create a new `Property` element as a child of an existing compatible [PropertyGroup](../Topic/PropertyGroup%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element. If necessary, create a new compatible `PropertyGroup` element immediately following the last `PropertyGroup` in the project.
